entry.title: Multisign payment protocol?
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik and Peter Todd discuss the practicality of wallets assuming that remote parties have an HD wallet. Jeff believes that interoperability common sense implies that the environment will be heterogeneous, invalidating any 'assume-each-party-uses-HD' logic for a long time. Peter suggests that implementing a wallet that uses stealth addresses for change could be advantageous in some scenarios regarding privacy.
